name: Deep Dive
description: Deep Dives are longer posts about a specific problem I've had to deal with in a project (or more often than not, multiple projects). They're a bit more rambly, a little less cohesive, but you get to see me suffer so maybe that's worth something.

name: console.log
description: uhh, basically stuff that barely counts as a post.

name: Retrospective
description: Retrospectives are posts talking about a project I've recently released or updated. They'll go over any inspirations I had, my decision making process, and some behind the scenes trivia.

name: Tutorial
description: How to make, implement, or create something. This blog wasn't intended for tutorials, but I figured I'd leave a spot for them when I find out about something useful.

name: Unsorted
description: I have no idea where to put these posts -- either because they represent a category of posts I don't write that much, they don't fit anywhere, or I... just haven't sorted them yet. Whoops.
